sense.def:
To request something
pomeni za nekaj uradno zaprositi.

seg.quote: The President requested an emergency session of the United Nations.
Visitors are requested not to pick the flowers.

sense.def:
To make a request for something
pomeni prositi za kaj.

seg.quote: I made repeated requests for money.

sense.def:
Kadar naredimo nekaj
on request
, tisto naredimo zato, ker smo naprošeni.

seg.quote: A booklet on this subject will be sent on request.

sense.def:
Kadar naredimo nekaj
at someone's request
, tisto naredimo zato, ker je določena oseba prosila za to.
